website_summaries.verdict: Don't have the space to dedicate to a standalone air hockey table? This is the best value for your money.
pros: The price is modest and this is a well built table for those who can't dedicate a lot of space to a full size unit
cons: This is less than half the size of a regulation air hockey table and that leads to some ridiculously fast moving games

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this game for the holidays to entertain many kids (and parents) without taking up a huge amount of space. It was a hit! I keep it stored under the bed and then pull it out when we are having parties or when the kids get bored. The product has taken some serious abuse from excited kids and has held up well. I highly recommend this product for anyone that wants the fun of having air hockey table but the convenience of storing it away out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: wrkgmama

customer_reviews.title: HUGE HIT FOR MY GRANDSON A++++
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson and my 7 year old granddaughter. They play it together all the time. I polished the top with wax and the puck slides great now. Love that it is really easy to put away when they are done. Doesn't take up too much space. I recommended buying the offered additional pucks and controller, as they are much higher quality than the pair that comes with this set. Worth getting. The pucks are bigger. I was a the best Nana ever when this gift was open. Not only that, all the kids at the party were anxious to get their turn to play this. BIG HIT
customer_reviews.author: C Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: OK so I read other reviews. Here is my take. One of the legs came with hardware backwards. Still was able to screw on. The fan power not quite enough but for the price it was fine. Fan was installed correctly! Now for the life experience part! This little Air Hockey table was a huge hit during the holidays! Everyone played it at least once. Great for kids from 4 to 16! And honestly my 18month old had a great time with it too. The curve corners make all the difference! So great having people not zombied out in front of a video game or TV movie. Get one, get playing, get laughing, get communicating!
customer_reviews.author: Joe joe

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to relive great childhood memories with my own kids!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in secure packaging and was in perfect condition upon arrival. Tested it out before we gift it to our boys and everything is in working order! My brother got an air hockey table one Christmas and we played it all the time! This'll be fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table for our 11 year old son for Christmas, as it was one of the main items on his list. It took us less than 10 minutes to put the legs and the goals on with the screws, bolts, washers, allen wrench, and screwdriver that came with the unit. It is sturdy, and the perfect size for either table top play, or floor play. The fan is powerful enough to float the puck, which glides nicely across the "rink". This item was a great choice, and I'd recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived broken. Two of the undermounted supports had completely separated from the table. You could see the dried glue had came clean off and the nails were so small there was no way they could have held it together on their own. Really disappointed and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Langdon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to assemble. We don't use it on the table, we have it on the floor and are very comfortable playing with it on the floor. I think the fan works well so the pucks "float". My 9 year old daughter plays with her friends and adults play it as well so it's a good size for everyone. My one complaint would be that the puck flies out a lot when you're really into it and hitting the puck hard. Maybe if the sides were a bit higher that wouldn't happen as often. Overall I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy N.

customer_reviews.title: So Cool.. And I'm a 40 year old that's not even close to being into toys
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the nostalgia but I recently played with this with my 8 year old nephew and I felt like a kid again. I must have played 2 straight hours with him. I don't generally have that kind of attention span for games. I guess that it's a simple enough platform to get into and find your childhood again. oh! as for my nephew he loves beating everyone at gatherings. The whole house got in on the action and wanted to play the winner ... You gotta let them win you know!
customer_reviews.author: Jovan

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality - enjoy while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids. It was great in the beginning and is a lot of fun for kids. However, after about 4 months the surface started developing air pockets/bubbles. When I contacted the manufacturer I was told it's out of warranty. They offer a 90 day warranty which is less than most product warranties. I could have gotten a bad item but with a small warranty window I am out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sahni

customer_reviews.title: priced right but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a good product for the money, however if I had to do it all over again I'd buy one that stands up to waist level. With three young boys, its tough for them not to lean on this which caused the stabilizers underneath to give away within 1-2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: MZZZ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The hockey table arrived with a hole in the bottom. Damaged before being boxed, because there was no damage to the shipping box itself. Product was also very dirty, with a heavy coat of fine dirt on the product surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Bayside Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding way to draw kids and adults from electronic gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Grandkids love it. Drew them away from gaming immediately. Played for hours. Sucked the adults in also. Nice that it sits on a coffe table so even small kids can play. Have handicapped grandson who can barely use right hand and arm. Incredibly he figured out how to push puck and now can play a game with other kids. Excellent eye hand trainer for him!
customer_reviews.author: Westwoodonthehill

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids.  It has not been destroyed, yet.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present to a kid. They are really used and abused, and so far the set has held up. I really did not believe that it would work so well. The small fan that they use really does the job. I would have liked an extra puck, or two, but this one seems to be holding out.
customer_reviews.author: w.smith

customer_reviews.title: Rudimentary toy
customer_reviews.text: Due to poor design the disks can get stuck inside the goal opening and hard to get out to resume the game. The disk stops sliding in some part of the table possibly due to weak air flow. The mounted goals did not fit perfectly and seem flimsy The whole table and parts seem to be made of low quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air hockey table for kids! My 4.5 and 6.5 year olds love it and it is sturdy enough for when my 3 and 1 year olds climb on top of it! My husband and I enjoy sitting with the kids and playing a game as well! Fun for the whole family! Good quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jalgal

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter. Would not work right from the start. The fan runs good when turned upside down, but stops running when turned right side up. Also, one of the side rails was chipped (which I could have lived with) but why should I. I believe this was a returned item and shipped back out again not repaired. Question is "why, with all the low ratings, is this "Amazon Choice' rated. Don"t believe anyone saying this is a quality manufactured product. Very cheaply made and going back tomorrow. First time disappointed with Amazon product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun table but no predrilled holes
customer_reviews.text: It was missing holes I thought would've been pre-drilled for the point counter on each side of the tables. I drilled them but not exactly what I wanted to deal with xmas eve. HOWEVER, my son, friends and family have been having a blast with the table. great size, and my 9 yr old can carry it. However, he is determined lol. We play on the floor most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Problem quickly resolved
customer_reviews.text: The game came with a problem: the fan underneath the surface was sticking and not rotating. I called Amazon and another was quickly shipped (we returned the original in the packing for the replacement) and the replacement works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J P Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: My three grandsons, ages 2, 5, and 9 all love this air hockey game. They play it a lot and is easy enough for the two-almost three year old to play. It’s extremely easy to assemble in about 10 minutes and if made of quality materials. Very solid. Highly recommended air hockey game for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy23Boys

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect and kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect and kids love it! But the fan it came with was making a ton of noise and not working well. We had to buy another fan and replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a very solid and well constructed air hockey game. It is easy to assemble...all the guide holes lined up just right. The fan strength is just right to keep the puck moving, although the air flow is a bit reduced in the corners which hardly effects play at all. It is nice to be able to play sitting on the floor or on a table top. My children and grandchildren love it. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Kids played for hours - even with movies and video games available too
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved playing this, ages 2 1/2, 6 and 8 1/2. Mom said there were some tears due to smacked knuckles, but once told that was part of the deal with this 'game', on they went for another two hours. Best present from grandpa and grandma ever!
customer_reviews.author: Just a typical woman

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a Young Player
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is only 4 years old but highly competitive. When he saw it on Christmas morning, he hollered “It’s A Sport!” Within an hour, he wanted to play everyone who came to visit. We have tons of fun playing. Nice, slick surface with a great fan! So glad I picked this one. Just the right price for a young player.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaNewbie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons loved this. Unfortunately the motor died after they had it for 2 weeks. Very disappointing. We ended up getting our money back.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Liss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little air hockey table
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, I was pretty impressed. Good size. Can be played on table or even set on floor. Only assembly is putting legs on & attaching goals - pretty easy. My 8 year old loves it & it was his favorite thing for Christmas. Good air flow. Only complaint was one of the felt bottoms from the striker fell off but was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 8 year old son from Santa and it is a hit. We also have a 7 and 5 year old, they are having a blast playing together. I love that it is small enough to store away, but still a good size for playing. Other reviews said there had been problems with the fan, so we opened it and set it up before Santa set it out and no problems here.
customer_reviews.author: JillyPilly

customer_reviews.title: Hot Hockey
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it! I bought two and they do play on it. Younger kids - bigger kids would want a bigger table I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's Gift

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Bought it for my 3 year old nephew. He is now obsessed. I was skeptical because of how small it was. I thought it would be more of a novelty thing. I was wrong. This little table operates just as good as a regular size one, just smaller. Very well made. Only minor defects I could find was fastener for one of the legs that stripped out with little effort and very small areas where the paint on top was smudged/missing.
customer_reviews.author: cummins

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tighten all the legs.  Bracket too small
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs has a metal bracket too small for the bolts that came with it. All the other hole brackets are the same size. Makes the table wobbly without the 4th leg tight. This was to be a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed! This thing fell apart with less than 10 hours of playing time. The fan seems to work for a few minutes, stops blowing air and then starts making a strange noise until you tap it gently on the side. Obviously a loose component or connection. The power switch fell apart after it lost the only hex nut holding it together, leaving exposed wiring and vampire tap connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my young nephews and they were so happy, they were speechless! It is a good size and can slip under a bed for storage if needed. Product seems to be of decent quality and looks like it may hold up to a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Air Hockey for the Amateur
customer_reviews.text: This table is a good size. Not too large and not too small. Runs well and fun for kids. Low to the ground so you have to sit to play it and could be easily damaged by someone stepping on it or falling on it if not put away. Fits under a bed for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cyprish

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Christmas gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited to receive this air hockey table for Christmas as that's what he wanted. When our son took it out of the box to assemble, we all noticed blue lines on the table from when it was made. This was an embarrassment and disappointment as this was a gift from us. Don't think we would order from them ever again!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poor QC
customer_reviews.text: The felt paddle backer fell off my n the first 5 minutes of use. Now the paddle scratches the surface. One of the legs was missing threads for the bolt, so had to zip tie the leg on; poor QC and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lap

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases for last Christmas. My three and two year old grandsons love it! Their parents love it. We all love it. Can't go wrong on this one. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were going back-and-forth on this purchase. We looked at many hockey tabletops and finally decided on this one for our price range. Before it a ride I was hesitant, but now have made a complete 180 on this product. It is very sturdy. My two year old jumps on top of the table when we are not looking. Up to this point no cracks or bends. The fan is strong enough to play the game effectively. It's moderately loud, but tolerable. Especially when playing and having fun. Yes, I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: charlez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took about 10 minutes and the kids started playing immediately. It's actually larger than expected, in the best possible way and is high enough above the floor for kids and adults to sit comfortably on the floor while playing. Hope you enjoy as much as we do!
customer_reviews.author: rstar646

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT GIFT!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 8-year-old twins at Christmas. They love it. Works well and occupies them for at least an hour. Easy to set up. No problems. Good size too!
customer_reviews.author: NC Twin Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This table top air hockey is great for grandparents who want toys out when the grandkids arrive, and want to be able to store the toys in-between. This table top idea is perfect! Our kids all seem to love the game...ages 4 to 12. The board is well made and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Meem S

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about this purchase since there a lot of negative reviews. My son wanted an air hockey table and I didnt want to spend a fortune nor do we have much room. Everything has been great. The fan is correct and was easy to assemble. It is sturdy too which has been proven by my 3 year old constantly sitting on it. The only negative is the scoring piece is flimsy and falls off or gets knocked over when you play making the score hard to keep. But for the price it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: h1h1

customer_reviews.title: Hope he enjoys air hockey!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for the Christmas angel tree program for some luck kid. It arrived well packaged and when I took it out of the box I could almost hear that hockey puck firing across the court. It is very study and is well made with air cushion device under it. I hope our little guy enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: D,.L  Smith

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased to say that we were lucky and received a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my nephew. I'm pleased to say that we were lucky and received a kit that assembled without any problems. The kids played on this thing for a few hours and never got bored. :)
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: We love this game! Got it for the Covid-19 quarantine, to play with the teenagers, but the pre-schooler and the parents enjoy it just as much. Good quality, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Not the best I've seen. Not the worst. The airflow is fairly weak and the puck stops on the sides where there isn't much airflow. The legs are extremely weak and I'm betting they won't make it a month before I'm repairing them somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We are pleasantly surprised with how well this small table plays - I enjoy it along with my 6 and 9 year old. It was easy to set up and seems durable!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Prather

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4 & 2 year old for Christmas. Been going on 20+ minutes and they haven’t stopped playing. Was very easy to put together, my husband opened the box and set up in less than 10 minutes. Air flow is great and it works really well for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Aln

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the review after we purchased this for our grandson. This game is easily played by adults with no problems whatsoever. I’m not sure what the issue is by other adults but my 6 foot husband loved playing with our grandsons! The disc slid effortlessly and never jumped or skipped. This table is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: tena ruhland-tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product... cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! First off, when I opened the box, one of the supports was already broken off (which isn’t overly critical to the product itself). But, you will spend 25 - 45 minutes assembling this only to plug it in and find out that the airflow is terrible! The puck goes no where, you could just buy some pucks and play on your kitchen table. This is cheaply manufactured and it shows very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Claus" enjoyed a couple of rounds before Christmas morning
customer_reviews.text: Instant hit! Assembled within 15 minutes and "Mr and Mrs. Claus" enjoyed a couple of rounds before Christmas morning! Had everyone from 5-6 year olds, teenagers, and adults play throughout the holidays. So far it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Betts

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for small footprint
customer_reviews.text: Visiting kids all love air hockey, and I purchased this to get them to interact with one another without their accursed 'smart' phones. (That's a whole other rant I won't bore you with.) I didn't want to mismanage precious gameroom space with a larger table that would only get used twice a month, so I jumped on this item at this pricepoint. Still works well, and my kids' trashtalking skills have greatly increased. I gave 4 stars due to the fact that assembly of the four legs is required, and some of the screws were absent. They were easy to replace with a quick search of the junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: machoneil

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great game. We have enjoyed it. It is a little smaller than I expected. And when it arrived it was a little damaged. I never contacted the seller, (I needed it for Christmas, and was late ordering it). The table still plays good and our kids have loved playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy LIfe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: You will definitely spend hours in this!!! Worth the buy. Both my hubby and son loved it! The quality is good. The air not that powerful but still enough to enjoy the game!
customer_reviews.author: Nardos

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for the cost. My boys 6 and 10 love it. Ii is a great option to buying large expensive versions.
customer_reviews.author: Justamomof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Happy Family
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The corners do lack air but for the price and size, it is perfect ! We bought it for our 5 year old, and it's a great family game. It's also a good size where you can have the game without it taking up half a room. Or without making a huge investment in something that will eventually get played out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Playcraft Sport 40" Table Top Air Hockey
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for six (6) year old grandson; he enjoy competition and quite astonishing does not get upset if he loses. Excellent interactive toy for all ages; and, provides quality time and enjoyment for our family. Only issue is the small wooden supports, at the corners, on the underside of the platform; as the small staples on one did not hold the support in place. I am to fix with super glue, and hope that works. Suggest to younger children to not put weight on table. Good price, value, and a lot of fun! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: RBryanK

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, good construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for an 8 year old boy. His father says it "pulls him away from video games". I am impressed at how solidly built the game is, considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Cota

customer_reviews.title: Good size, but easily stores under bed.
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to assemble. Easy to move for storage, but big enough to provide a sizable playing surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for my 5 year old and 9 year ...
customer_reviews.text: We picked this up for my kids for Christmas. It was a huge hit! It's the perfect size for my 5 year old and 9 year old to play together. The puck doesn't get stuck in the middle due to their inability to reach like in the full size tables. I took a star off for the air blowing power. I wish it was stronger. A lot of air is lost out the bottom. We thought the fan was on upside down like previous reviewers mentioned, but it was on the correct way. Still a ton of fun for both kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: vanbenneh

customer_reviews.title: it is what it is  - good for the price
customer_reviews.text: its an inexpensive air hockey table. good for young kids (under 10). its simple to set up, light enough to move, has some dead spots but its not that evident unless the puck stops on that particular spot. We only had it a few days and it serves the need but if you plan to use it a lot, forget it, go with a full size more robust table. Will report how long it lasts, it will be a race between my sons out growing it or it breaking. I would say it is what I expected so not sure if that is a 3 star or 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It works a lot better than anticipated. It’s sturdy and plays smoothly. Will update if I have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this my daughter bday. And she and her friends loves to spend a lot of time on this. Easy to tuck in under the bed. only thing is material for the stand is a little shabby but i manage to fixed it, nothing you can't do with a strong glue. But for the price i say still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: All I heard was laughing and having a good time for about an hour
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old granddaughter immediately wanted to play this when she got it. She ran and got the neighbor friend while I set it up on the kitchen table. All I heard was laughing and having a good time for about an hour. This came in second to the Xbox in the Christmas gift rating by her this year. Seriously what can compete with the Xbox for a seven year old? This will be huge this winter as indoor fun in my neighborhood. Sturdy, long enough that they are not knocking knuckles but not so long they can't reach the puck anywhere on the table
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great. B
customer_reviews.text: Fun sized air hockey game. Doesn’t take up too much space but big enough to still be competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Janiep67

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandsons and they love it. I wanted something they could play with together. They love it and had fun putting on the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Still working after rough play
customer_reviews.text: I give it four stars because even for my 7 year old, the table is a little small and he and his friends play rough with it, but it is still going with only a few minor scratches.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pedini

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren loved this game, however, it did not come with any instructions on how to play the game, which would be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: celodea

customer_reviews.title: We all love to play
customer_reviews.text: From the 5-year old girl to the 64-year old grandma, we all love to play though the 7-year old out scores us. Easily his favorite Christmas present this year.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheaply made. The felt already came off. The were already blurred, messy lines on the table. If you lean on it, it will break. It’s made poorly. I guess if you want a. Good one you need to pay up more $ for one. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: M. Solow

customer_reviews.title: My husband was worried that the kids wouldn't like this b/c it was too small and the puck ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was worried that the kids wouldn't like this b/c it was too small and the puck would fly off the table. He was so wrong...the kids LOVE it and the puck stays on the table just fine. A huge hit with my boys who are 5 and 6 1/2 and I enjoy a game or two myself!
customer_reviews.author: jersey8574

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Everyone from 3-63 in our family LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old LOVES this. It's a perfect table top size and it's a ton of fun. Actually, my husband, brothers, dad, and nephews ALL love it.. from ages 3-63! :) Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Sozz

customer_reviews.title: Happy family
customer_reviews.text: We live it! It was a Christmas present and the girls (age 8 and 5) love to play against their father. We have used in on the ground and it works good. On top of a table would be better.... We had no issues with packaging or missing pieces. We are happy with the value!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: works well for a smaller table. Good size to slide under my son's bed when he isn't playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Caherbst

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for a table top game. Works great. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: It fun but when it arrived it was missing bolts for ...
customer_reviews.text: It fun but when it arrived it was missing bolts for the legs, a score keeping arrow. The leg has already fallen off due to only one bolt. The other score keeping arrow fell off while we were playing. Not very well made.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia del castillo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about 2 years and it is still in good shape. The grand kids (ages 3-14) use it and have a blast!
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Great table, fun to play. It’s just not as sturdy as I’d hoped it’d be.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best gift of the year!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and we have all played. Great way to put down the electronics and spend time together. Super easy to put together. But hard to find a spot to put it that it’s out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the schoolage room at out daycare. The kids loce this. Perfect for kids. Just gotta find a table with the right height since the legs are so short. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Legs need improvment
customer_reviews.text: The legs are not very sturdy, do not put any weight on the table
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: They love it and want to play when they come over
customer_reviews.text: Got for Christmas but finally opened for grand kids to play. They love it and want to play when they come over. So far it has held up with their rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with this already! My entire family has loved playing with this. It does already have scuff marks on it but when we play we get competitive! Would have given 5 stars but the legs don't fold in...have to take them off to store under bed or couch
customer_reviews.author: RM79

customer_reviews.title: The best gift!
customer_reviews.text: The table top air hockey was a big hit! My grandchildren (girl, age 4, and boy, age 3) loved it. In fact, it was their favorite Christmas present. They had so much fun playing it together. It seemed to increase their eye/hand coordination. Easy to put together. The air in the game was just right. This toy was perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pascarella

customer_reviews.title: Poor airflow
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Solid construction. Unfortunately, very weak airflow not lifting the puck at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 6 and 8 years old and they love it. It's much smaller than arcade-sized units which cost $100s, but good enough for this age group. It's portable and easy to put away. Construction is sturdy and it feels like it will last well beyond my kids' interest in it (years). The airflow is enough that the puck glides smoothly. The fan is loud enough to hear in the next room so that I can hear if it's left on, but during actual play, the fan noise is easily over-shadowed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged. So much for the Christmas gift. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas gift ever. My kids love having an air hockey table at home it's nice to have when the weather doesn't permit you to go outside. Also the size is perfect for apartment living.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this. I put the legs on and within minutes they broke off because my kid leaned on it a little. I tried to put the threaded pieces back in the particle board and it just broke again. Such a waste of money. Go buy the plastic one, at least you won't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two of these air hockey tables for two grandsons birthday. What was supposed to be entertainment for the 5-year old boys ended up being a duel between kids vs. grown-ups on whose turn it was to play. We were fortunate that neither table had the "upside-down fan" issue that so may others' seemed to have. The tables arrived in timely fashion and in good packaging. My only complaint is that the table materials are of cheaper grade and won't last as long as we'd like.
customer_reviews.author: GThompson

customer_reviews.title: It was an easy fix! We moved the fan
customer_reviews.text: We had to do a minor adjustment - but the table was well worth the cost!! The fan didn't completely cover the hole for air entry on the under side. It was an easy fix! We moved the fan, screwed the holder back in to cover the air entry hole completely, and voila - the table worked perfectly. Lots of fun for everyone from my 9 year old son to my 58 year old husband.
customer_reviews.author: chemteach

customer_reviews.title: Broken in six weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s fifth birthday. Air stream was weak but acceptable. Six weeks later, the legs have broken off (not from rough play—one leg broke so we had to remove the others) and the air is so weak the puck doesn’t make it all the way across the playing surface. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality, and i still have it working without any problem for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: abbas

customer_reviews.title: Great hockey table!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this air hockey table for just over a year now we got it last Christmas and it's been nothing but fun. The only problem we had was the scoring sliders...they fell off too easily and disappeared so we have to keep score in our heads, but otherwise it's very durable and a great table that has given us no problems whatsoever. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Vadala

customer_reviews.title: It's his favorite gift. We play it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas. It's his favorite gift. We play it all the time. A timeless classic. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Sable

customer_reviews.title: Product is sturdier than I imagined and fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Santa left this for my seven year old daughter. It is getting a lot of use. Product is sturdier than I imagined and fun for the whole family! I will say we play on the floor, not a table, because games in my house can get aggressive and I worry about my table getting scratched. Even on the floor it is a good height.
customer_reviews.author: Baker Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 4 year old grandson, and he is enjoying it very much. Seems well constructed, and the size is good for floor or table top play. Only one small issue, the slider for score keeping was missing from one side, but he doesn't mind!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lum

customer_reviews.title: Good starter table for the little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but is quite flimsy and light weight. The puck doesn't move as smoothly as it probably should on the air flow. Still a pretty good starter air hockey table for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old nephews loved it! There is a warning on the box ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephews loved it! There is a warning on the box about small parts, but the sliders for the scoring do come off very easily, so remove these if there are babies around!
customer_reviews.author: Megan R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for children
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas present for our five year old. She absolutely loves it and is constantly asking people to play a game with her. The table is of sturdy quality and the air flow is adequate for the small pucks. The only drawback we have found is that due to the size of the table and "goal" it is very easy to block all scoring attempts by simply placing your paddle in the center of the slot... Even with that, the table has already provided hours of fun for our family and our daughter's friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Came with a stripped opening where the screw should fit. My husband has to buy something to fit in the wood so that we can screw the 4th leg in tightly. Table otherwise works great and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Z

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I like this air hockey table, and my boys do too. If everything had arrived in perfect condition I would have given it a 4-star rating. I docked it because one of the four plastic corners where the screws hold the fan was cracked, and because a couple of screw-holes weren't pre-drilled for me. Anyway, it's big enough to have some fun now that's it's assembled and now that the cracked plastic is securely taped up.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

product_meta.title: Playcraft Sport 40-Inch Table Top Air Hockey
feature_bullets: CE certified and ul approved motor.
